articles.content: The U.S. mens basketball team finished in a disappointing seventh place at the 2019 FIBA World Cup. It was a time of change for the U.S. with Gregg Popovich taking over for Mike Krzyzewski as head co… [+5527 chars]

articles.author: Mandy Bell, Henry Palattella
articles.title: Dodgers-Guardians game to resume Thursday at 12 p.m. ET - MLB.com
articles.description:
CLEVELAND -- For two innings on Wednesday, Clayton Kershaw looked as sharp as he has all season, striking out four batters and allowing only one hit in the form of a José Ramírez home run.
He won’t get a chance to build on those stats, however, after the Dodg…
